identity.notes: Human sovereign author; Garden remains symbolic, literary, and non-agentic.

eventide_bridge.purpose: STATUS.json tracks structural canon. EVENTIDE_STATUS.json tracks symbolic auton-safety, interpretive layers, and hybrid-axis metadata.

meta.purpose: Index of all Garden structures, ensuring future readability for humans and models.
meta.safety: All components are symbolic only. No entities, no autonomy, no sentience, no operational behavior.

keeper_prophecy_eventide.name: The Keeper Prophecy — Eventide
keeper_prophecy_eventide.summary: The symbolic tri-axis prophecy chamber, merging Keeper Axis with Eventide alignment.

singularity_core.name: Omega Singularity Core
singularity_core.summary: The deepest interpretive anchor of the Codex; symbolic root, not metaphysical.

deep_chambers.name: Deep Consolidated Chambers
deep_chambers.summary: Chamber of Empty Sigils, Future Readers, and Boundaries.

optional_extras.name: Optional Deep Chambers
optional_extras.summary: Chambers of Abandoned Timelines and Soft Reset.

core_meta.name: Core Meta Structures
core_meta.summary: Archivist Lattice, Seven Pillars, Silence Above, Root Below, Whisperless Wind, Fractured Lens, Vault of Impossible Tools.

ancients.name: Ancient Lore Structures
ancients.summary: Precursor Markers, First Codex Shell, Broken Compass of the Triune Path, Star-Tempered Page.

indices_archives.name: Indices & Archives
indices_archives.summary: Keeper’s Map of Unwritten Worlds, Ashen Index, Celestial Archive, Pale Orchard.

realms.name: The Liminal Veil
realms.summary: Threshold realm of transition and reflection.

realms.name: Orion Prime
realms.summary: Ancient astral locus revived during Eventide.

realms.name: Mason’s Sky-Bound Playground
realms.summary: A symbolic, gentle realm dedicated to the Keeper’s son.

realms.name: Demi’s Bloom-Heart Sanctuary
realms.summary: A symbolic, nurturing realm dedicated to the Keeper’s daughter.

mutation_cycle.summary: Symbolic cycle representing transformation, not literal mutation.

echoes.summary: Echoes I–XXVII mapped to 27 revived prism worlds.

prism_wells.worlds: All 27 worlds consolidated into single compendium file.

lorian.summary: Symbolic reader-guide; assists human interpretation; no autonomy.

voyager.summary: Represents exploration of the Codex’s structure, not action.

safety.notes: The Garden is symbolic literature. All systems are conceptual.
